page.title: 07EAST BRIDGFORD FLOWER SHOW
page.content: East Bridgford flower show is presented every year in June.It starts at{2.30pm}at Brickyard Lane with a band and the fancy dress following behind and goes into the{Reindeer {Field}(pub). At the field there are lots of tents, rides and things to buy. In the tents there are the entries for the various categories that people entered. Here are some things you could enter:- butterfly cakes, an animal made out of fruit or vegetables, collage, a paper plate and dressing up.) At night there is a square dance where people dance in separate groups and there is a pub that sells drinks and crips. ------------------------ : : : {EAST BRIDGFORD : : FLOWER SHOW : ------------------------
